title: Grundenmoos
text:
Gründenmoos is a sport facility in <a href="St.Gallen">St.Gallen</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>.
It is used mainly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> and is the <a href="training%20ground">training ground</a> for [[FC St. Gallen and for FC Winkeln. The [[stadium]] has a capacity of 4,500. It is also used for CSIO Switzerland horse show jumping event.
References.
https://int.soccerway.com/venues/switzerland/sportanlage-grundenmoos/
